TopicTitle: Another New Guy, although been playing KSP for a few weeks now.

Articles.Content: Hey there everyone, call me rampage. I have been playing KSP now for about 3 weeks. All I can say is how great it is and how exciting it is to play. I have not gotten into any mods quite yet, so I play with stock parts but with that said since I am a Mechanical Engineering student with an Aerospace minor in the works I can not deny that I have been doing most of the math involved in getting my rockets up out of Kerbin when I feel like it. I look forward to being an active part of the KSP Community now, and even more once I get off a laptop and onto a desktop.
Most of us start learning the math after finding the game, so you have a big headstart. Welcome to the game, and to the forum.
Thank you, and the great part of it is that I am currently using KSP to study for my Introduction to Aerospace final, so thank you KSP for letting me play and study!

Thank you, and the great part of it is that I am currently using KSP to study for my Introduction to Aerospace final, so thank you KSP for letting me play and study!

Gosh, I wish my classes let me play games to study.

But no, seriously, welcome. Good to see a fellow engineer - I'm a graduating structural engineer so it's a tad different then your experience.

Greetings.
Welcome. Hope you'll enjoy your time here
